name: SLENDER THE 8 GBC PAGES (Rom)
description:
"SLENDER THE EIGHT PAGES" Demake only for the Gameboy Color.

This is a Game Boy Color rom (.gb file). It can only be played in a Game Boy color emulator, or on "real hardware" with a "flashcart". 

Don't want to download? Play in your browser: https://jwgllc.itch.io/slender-the-8-gb-pages-browser

JWG.LLC Rated E10+: Horror themes
